item.title: Leftist Radicals In Office Are Much More Dangerous Than Fringe Radicals On Podcasts
item.description: The radicals Democrats label 'right-wing' are on podcasts. The left-wing radicals are in office.

item.title: The New York Times Is Terrified Of Mamdani, The Mayor It Helped Create
item.description: The New York Times helped create Zohran Mamdani, and now the paper is worried that he will do everything he says.

item.title: Dems Try To Sabotage Push For Proof Of Citizenship To Vote
item.description: Leftist Groups Flood the EAC with comments in an effort to kill a call for documentary proof of U.S. citizenship to vote in U.S. elections.

item.title: Supreme Court Signals Skepticism About Trump’s ‘Emergency’ Tariffs
item.description: '[T]hese are not things that are thought of as Article II powers, [but] quintessential Article I powers,' said Justice Kagan.

item.title: If Arctic Frost Perpetrators Don’t Go To Jail, Conservatives Will
item.description: To conservatives, Arctic Frost is a scandal. To Democrats, it’s their new baseline. And the only way to stop it is to punish them.
